profile.headline: Lead Software Engineer
profile.summary: Seeking a Software Engineer position leveraging my expertise in Python, Django, PostgreSQL, MySQL and to design, develop, and maintain high-performance web applications. Seeking a Software Engineer role that provides opportunities for continuous learning and professional growth, allowing me to expand my technical expertise and contribute to a dynamic and collaborative team. To obtain a challenging Software Engineer position where I can utilize my programming skills, problem-solving abilities, and passion for technology to contribute to the development and implementation of innovative and high-quality software solutions.

highlights: Spearheaded the end-to-end software development lifecycle for key projects using Python, from concept and design to deployment and maintenance.
Designed and implemented robust automated testing frameworks, significantly improving feature quality and reliability.
Authored comprehensive technical documentation, including design specifications, API guides, and user manuals to support development and onboarding.
Led project planning sessions, defined technical roadmaps, and managed sprint backlogs to ensure timely delivery of features.
Mentored a team of junior engineers, conducted code reviews, and fostered a culture of collaboration and high-quality coding standards.
Architected and deployed scalable Django microservices with optimized PostgreSQL schemas, ensuring high-performance backend systems and data persistence.
Orchestrated seamless API integrations and refactored endpoints, achieving sub-second latency and enhancing application interoperability.
Implemented Git-based CI/CD pipelines and pytest-driven TDD, guaranteeing robust code quality and rapid feature iteration within Agile/Scrum sprints.
Containerized application deployments using Docker, ensuring consistent cross-environment execution and streamlined deployment processes.
Developed a custom Paramiko-based SSH context manager, migrating from legacy PySFTP to establish secure, passwordless connections and mitigate security vulnerabilities.
Engineered a modularized Excel-to-PDF conversion service and a PostgreSQL sequence generator, enabling customizable document generation and ACID-compliant data integrity.

education.school: NMIMS Mukesh Patel School of Technology Management & Engineering, Mumbai
